title: The Shade

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A shrouded player will receive a basic attack the next night.
- You may visit a previously shrouded player to deal a powerful attack.
- If there are 4 or less players, your attacks become powerful and unstoppable respectively.
- If every living player had been shrouded, you instantly win and end the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you or shroud all living players.

desc:
Post 429
Something watching you in the dark, waiting for the perfect time to strike.
